caption.p: Effects of the inhaled Origanum majorana essential oil (1%OmEO (III) and 3%OmEO (IV)) on the MDA ( A) and protein carbonyls ( B) levels estimated in the rat hippocampal homogenates of the Aβ1-42-treated rats. Values are means ± S.E.M. ( n = 3 animals per group). Statistical significance was determined by one-way ANOVA. For Tukey’s post hoc analyses: A. Sham (I) vs. Aβ1-42 (II): * p = 0.0110, Aβ1-42 (II) vs. Aβ1-42 + 1%OmEO (III): ## p = 0.0023 and Aβ1-42 (II) vs. Aβ1-42 + 3%OmEO (IV): # p = 0.0015; B. Sham (I) vs. Aβ1-42 (II): * p = 0.0283 and Aβ1-42 (II) vs. Aβ1-42 + 1%OmEO (III): # p = 0.0224.
